title: Genius comment on the reality of living as a women in this world!
review: So basically, we have got a women, escaping her husband, only to be hit and locked down by the patriarchal society and its claim of protecting her from the danger that lurks outside. Choosing not to believe those claims, she beat the patriarchal society and escapes, yet to her surprise. The patriarchal society was telling the truth. The Outside has been invaded by a whole lot of danger. Yet instead of choosing to hide in safety. She decided to fight back, win and go out of her way to help rid the world of that danger! Genius
